values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: I'm very serious about no alcohol, no drugs. Life is too beautiful.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: I really believe in the philosophy that you create your own universe. I'm just trying to create a good one for myself.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: Maybe there is no actual place called hell. Maybe hell is just having to listen to our grandparents breathe through their noses when they're eating sandwiches.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: Maybe other people will try to limit me but I don't limit myself.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: Ya know what I do almost every day? I wash. Personal hygiene is part of the package with me.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: If you've got a talent, protect it.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: I wake up some mornings and sit and have my coffee and look out at my beautiful garden, and I go, 'Remember how good this is. Because you can lose it.'
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: My focus is to forget the pain of life. Forget the pain, mock the pain, reduce it. And laugh.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: Life opens up opportunities to you, and you either take them or you stay afraid of taking them.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: My mother was a professional sick person; she took a lot of pain pills. There are many people like that. It's just how they are used to getting attention. I always remember she's the daughter of alcoholics who'd leave her alone at Christmas time.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: I don't think human beings learn anything without desperation. Desperation is a necessary ingredient to learning anything or creating anything. Period. If you ain't desperate at some point, you ain't interesting.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: I've arrived at the place if I'm not taking a career risk, I'm not happy. If I'm scared, then I know I'm being challenged.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: People need motivation to do anything. I don't think human beings learn anything without desperation.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: There was a time when people said, 'Jim, if you keep on making faces, your face will freeze like that.' Now they just say, 'Pay him!'
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: Either you're the one erasing or you're the one being erased.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: Life is an ordeal, albeit an exciting one, but I wouldn't trade it for the good old days of poverty and obscurity.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: Originality is really important.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: I praticed making faces in the mirror and it would drive my mother crazy. She used to scare me by saying that I was going to see the devil if I kept looking in the mirror. That fascinated me even more, of course.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: I really want to love somebody. I do. I just don't know if it's possible forever and ever.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: I know this sounds strange, but as a kid, I was really shy. Painfully shy. The turning point was freshman year, when I was the biggest geek alive. No one, I mean no one, even talked to me.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: My report card always said, 'Jim finishes first and then disrupts the other students'.
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: Green Eggs and Ham was the story of my life. I wouldn't eat a thing when I was a kid, but Dr. Seuss inspired me to try cauliflower!
values.author: Jim Carrey
values.authorOccupation: Actor, stand-up comedian, screenwriter, film producer

values.authorQuote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: People fear death even more than pain. It's strange that they fear death. Life hurts a lot more than death. At the point of death, the pain is over. Yeah, I guess it is a friend.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: There are things known and things unknown and in between are the doors.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Expose yourself to your deepest fear; after that, fear has no power, and the fear of freedom shrinks and vanishes. You are free.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: The most important kind of freedom is to be what you really are. You trade in your reality for a role. You give up your ability to feel, and in exchange, put on a mask.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Whoever controls the media, controls the mind.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: I like people who shake other people up and make them feel uncomfortable.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Where's your will to be weird?
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: It's like gambling somehow. You go out for a night of drinking and you don't know where your going to end up the next day. It could work out good or it could be disastrous. It's like the throw of the dice.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Some of the worst mistakes of my life have been haircuts.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: This is the strangest life I've ever known.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Violence isn't always evil. What's evil is the infatuation with violence.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Death makes angels of us all and gives us wings where we had shoulders smooth as ravens claws.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Hatred is a very underestimated emotion.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Actually I don't remember being born, it must have happened during one of my black outs.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: I see myself as an intelligent, sensitive human, with the soul of a clown which forces me to blow it at the most important moments.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Listen, real poetry doesn't say anything; it just ticks off the possibilities. Opens all doors. You can walk through any one that suits you.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: When you make your peace with authority, you become authority.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: We fear violence less than our own feelings. Personal, private, solitary pain is more terrifying than what anyone else can inflict.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: I am interested in anything about revolt, disorder, chaos-especially activity that seems to have no meaning. It seems to me to be the road toward freedom... Rather than starting inside, I start outside and reach the mental through the physical.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Sex is full of lies. The body tries to tell the truth. But, it's usually too battered with rules to be heard, and bound with pretenses so it can hardly move. We cripple ourselves with lies.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Love cannot save you from your own fate.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: I believe in a long, prolonged, derangement of the senses in order to obtain the unknown.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: The most loving parents and relatives commit murder with smiles on their faces. They force us to destroy the person we really are: a subtle kind of murder.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Music inflames temperament.
values.author: Jim Morrison

values.authorQuote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Whatever good things we build end up building us.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Take advantage of every opportunity to practice your communication skills so that when important occasions arise, you will have the gift, the style, the sharpness, the clarity, and the emotions to affect other people.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. That is something you have charge of.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Maturity is the ability to reap without apology and not complain when things don't go well.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Let others lead small lives, but not you. Let others argue over small things, but not you. Let others cry over small hurts, but not you. Let others leave their future in someone else's hands, but not you.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: The more you know the less you need to say.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: If you go to work on your goals, your goals will go to work on you. If you go to work on your plan, your plan will go to work on you. Whatever good things we build end up building us.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying the basic fundamentals.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: Failure is not a single, cataclysmic event. You don't fail overnight. Instead, failure is a few errors in judgement, repeated every day.
values.author: Jim Rohn

values.authorQuote: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I will thank God for the day and the moment I have.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: If you laugh, you think, and you cry, that's a full day. That's a heck of a day. You do that seven days a week, you're going to have something special.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: And if you see me, smile and maybe give me a hug. That's important to me too.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: How do you go from where you are to where you wanna be? And I think you have to have an enthusiasm for life. You have to have a dream, a goal. And you have to be willing to work for it.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: People think I have courage. The courage in my family are my wife Pam, my three daughters, here, Nicole, Jamie, LeeAnn, my mom, who's right here too.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: We need your help. I need your help. We need money for research. It may not save my life. It may save my children's life. It may save someone you love. And it's very important.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: What enables us to achieve our greatness contains the seeds of our destruction.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: Time is very precious to me. I don't know how much I have left and I have some things that I would like to say. Hopefully, at the end, I will have said something that will be important to other people too.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I just got one last thing, I urge all of you, all of you, to enjoy your life, the precious moments you have. To spend each day with some laughter and some thought, to get you're emotions going.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: Don't give up. Don't ever give up.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I asked a ref if he could give me a technical foul for thinking bad things about him. He said, of course not. I said, well, I think you stink. And he gave me a technical. You can't trust em.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: Cancer can take away all of my physical abilities. It cannot touch my mind, it cannot touch my heart, and it cannot touch my soul.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: No matter what business you're in, you can't run in place or someone will pass you by. It doesn't matter how many games you've won.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: But try if you can to support, whether it's AIDS or the cancer foundation, so that someone else might survive, might prosper, and might actually be cured of this dreaded disease.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I can't tell you what an honor it is, to even be mentioned in the same breath with Arthur Ashe. This is something I certainly will treasure forever.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I talked about my family, my family's so important.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I'll also tell you that five hundred thousand people will die this year of cancer. And I'll also tell you that one in every four will be afflicted with this disease, and yet, somehow, we seem to have put it in a little bit of the background.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: Now I'm fighting cancer, everybody knows that. People ask me all the time about how you go through your life and how's your day, and nothing is changed for me.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: Now, I look at where I am now and I know what I wanna to do. What I would like to be able to do is to spend whatever time I have left and to give, and maybe some hope to others.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: How many people do you know who've had their dream come true? You're looking at one.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I was an absolute maniac, a terrible husband and father.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I set out very calculatedly to become known. The only thing I maybe miscalculated was how easy it would be.
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: And I'm going to work as hard as I can... for cancer research and hopefully, maybe, we'll have some cures and some breakthroughs. I'd like to think I'm going to fight my brains out to be back here again next year for the Arthur Ashe recipient. I want to give it next year!
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: I'm not happy to be here. I'm just happy to be!
values.author: Jim Valvano

values.authorQuote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: You have to go on and be crazy. Craziness is like heaven.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Music doesn't lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Even Castles made of sand, fall into the sea, eventually.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Excuse me while I kiss the sky.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Music is a safe kind of high.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: I used to live in a room full of mirrors; all I could see was me. I take my spirit and I crash my mirrors, now the whole world is here for me to see.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: You have to give people something to dream on.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: I'm the one that has to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life, the way I want to.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: I've been imitated so well I've heard people copy my mistakes.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Blues is easy to play, but hard to feel.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Imagination is the key to my lyrics. The rest is painted with a little science fiction.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: If it was up to me, there wouldn't be no such thing as the establishment.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Music is my religion.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Sometimes you want to give up the guitar, you'll hate the guitar. But if you stick with it, you're gonna be rewarded.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: When I die, I want people to play my music, go wild and freak out and do anything they want to do.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: It's funny how most people love the dead, once you're dead, you're made for life.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: If I'm free, it's because I'm always running.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: All I'm gonna do is just go on and do what I feel.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: I wish they'd had electric guitars in cotton fields back in the good old days. A whole lot of things would've been straightened out.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Music makes me high on stage, and that's the truth. It's like being almost addicted to music.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: I was trying to do too many things at the same time, which is my nature. But I was enjoying it, and I still do enjoy it.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: White collar conservative flashin down the street, pointing that plastic finger at me, they all assume my kind will drop and die, but I'm gonna wave my freak flag high.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: You have to forget about what other people say, when you're supposed to die, or when you're supposed to be loving. You have to forget about all these things.
values.author: Jimi Hendrix

values.authorQuote: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: I hate to mention age, but I come from an era when we weren't consumed by technology and television.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: Older and wiser voices can help you find the right path, if you are only willing to listen.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: Phish and Dave Matthews really know their audiences and really treat them well.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: I'm inspired by people who keep on rolling, no matter their age.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: I just want to live happily ever after, every now and then.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: Well, I'm still here. Didn't have to go to rehab, and I'm not broke.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: I still consider it a summer job, though. So, I try to maintain that summer job as long as I can. But it's exciting to be able to have the opportunity to do things I always dreamed of as a kid.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: Is it ignorance or apathy? Hey, I don't know and I don't care.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: It's been wonderful for me, and I feel so privileged to have fans that are that loyal.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: If life gives you limes, make margaritas.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: Indecision may or may not be my problem.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: We are the people our parents warned us about.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: I sell escapism.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: People who think too much before they act don't act too much.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: It takes no more time to see the good side of life than it takes to see the bad.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: I can only say the first thing that pops into my mind is I remember, years ago, seeing kind of a has-been country singer working - when I first moved to Nashville - in a bar in a Holiday Inn.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: And you find as a writer there are certain spots on the planet where you write better than others, and I believe in that. And New Orleans is one of them.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: If it doesn't work out there will never be any doubt that the pleasure was worth all the pain.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: Searching is half the fun: life is much more manageable when thought of as a scavenger hunt as opposed to a surprise party.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: These old ballparks are like cathedrals in America. We don't have big old Gothic cathedrals like they do in Europe. But we got baseball parks.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: Moderation is the key so I work certain amount of time and then I take a certain amount of time off.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: To describe my scarce leisure time in today's terms, I always default to reading.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: And I try to give the best bang for the buck. I love performing more than anything else.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: There's something missing in the music industry today... and it's music. Songs you hear don't last, it's just product fed to you by the industry.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: If we weren't all crazy, we'd just go insane.
values.author: Jimmy Buffett

values.authorQuote: You can do what you have to do, and sometimes you can do it even better than you think you can.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: We become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: There's always an element of self delusion among people who believe they ought to be President. There's an underestimation of your opponent and an overestimation of your own abilities. This is compatible with being rich and powerful, the idea that we were blessed by God because we deserve to be blessed.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: I say to you quite frankly that the time for racial discrimination is over.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: We've become, now, an oligarchy instead of a democracy. I think that's been the worst damage to the basic moral and ethical standards to the American political system that I've ever seen in my life.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: I think what's going on in Guantanamo Bay and other places is a disgrace to the U.S.A. I wouldn't say it's the cause of terrorism, but it has given impetus and excuses to potential terrorists to lash out at our country and justify their despicable acts.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: America did not invent human rights. In a very real sense human rights invented America.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: If you're totally illiterate and living on one dollar a day, the benefits of globalization never come to you.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: Human rights is the soul of our foreign policy, because human rights is the very soul of our sense of nationhood.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: We can't equate democracy with Christianity because the largest democracy on earth is India, which is primarily Hindu. The third largest democracy is Indonesia, which is Islamic. Democracy and freedom are not dependent on Christian beliefs.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: I hate to see complacency prevail in our lives when it's so directly contrary to the teaching of Christ.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: War may sometimes be a necessary evil. But no matter how necessary, it is always an evil, never a good. We will not learn how to live together in peace by killing each other's children.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: In this outward and physical ceremony we attest once again to the inner and spiritual strength of our Nation. As my high school teacher, Miss Julia Coleman, used to say: 'We must adjust to changing times and still hold to unchanging principles.'
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: Republicans are men of narrow vision, who are afraid of the future.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: I had very good support from Democrats and Republicans all throughout my administration. I had a very high batting average. We added more jobs per year in my four years than any other president since the Second World War.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: For this generation, ours, life is nuclear survival, liberty is human rights, the pursuit of happiness is a planet whose resources are devoted to the physical and spiritual nourishment of its inhabitants.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: We cannot be both the world's leading champion of peace and the world's leading supplier of the weapons of war.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: The experience of democracy is like the experience of life itself-always changing, infinite in its variety, sometimes turbulent and all the more valuable for having been tested by adversity.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: I'll never tell a lie. I'll never make a misleading statement. I'll never betray the confidence that any of you had in me. And I'll never avoid a controversial issue.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: My great-grandfather and his two brothers fought at Gettysburg. They were in artillery, and they survived the war, thank goodness. So I revere what they did. I think their motivations were honorable when they undertook the war and participated in it along with other Southerners.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: I wish I had known when I was in the White House what I know now about the Third World.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: Testing oneself is best when done alone.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: Aggression unopposed becomes a contagious disease.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: You can't divorce religious belief and public service I've never detected any conflict between God's will and my political duty. If you violate one, you violate the other.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: To deal with individual human needs at the everyday level can be noble sometimes.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: You just have to have a simple faith.
values.author: Jimmy Carter

values.authorQuote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: Part of my act is meant to shake you up. It looks like I'm being funny, but I'm reminding you of other things. Life is tough, darling. Life is hard. And we better laugh at everything; otherwise, we're going down the tube.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I don't excercise. If God had wanted me to bend over, he would have put diamonds on the floor.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: The first time I see a jogger smiling, I'll consider it.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: Thank God we're living in a country where the sky's the limit, the stores are open late and you can shop in bed thanks to television.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: People say that money is not the key to happiness, but I always figured if you have enough money, you can have a key made.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I blame my mother for my poor sex life. All she told me was 'the man goes on top and the woman underneath.' For three years my husband and I slept in bunk beds.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I was smart enough to go through any door that opened.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: Never floss with a stranger.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I told my mother-in-law that my house was her house, and she said, 'Get the hell off my property.'
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I wish I had a twin, so I could know what I'd look like without plastic surgery.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: If God wanted us to bend over he'd put diamonds on the floor.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny. Next. Everyone gets so upset about the wrong things.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I've had so much plastic surgery, when I die they will donate my body to Tupperware.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I hate old people, I hate children. I think any celebrity that adopts a child from a third world country is a fool.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: It's like, God, I'm in my 80s. Nobody, when I die, is going to say, 'How young?' They're going to say she had a great ride.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: A man can sleep around, no questions asked, but if a woman makes nineteen or twenty mistakes she's a tramp.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I hate reality shows that are not reality.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: Show business is - you're there by somebody's fluke. And as long as somebody likes you, and the show is going well, you're fine. I'd do anything. There's so much I want to do.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I have flabby thighs, but fortunately my stomach covers them.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw that my bath toys were a toaster and a radio.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: Don't follow any advice, no matter how good, until you feel as deeply in your spirit as you think in your mind that the counsel is wise.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: It's been so long since I've had sex I've forgotten who ties up whom.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: My best birth control now is just to leave the lights on.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: Being Jewish has always been important to me. I now have 6M tattooed on the inside of my left arm. It's only a half-inch, but every time anyone sees it, they're reminded of the six million who perished, and so am I.
values.author: Joan Rivers
values.authorOccupation: Stand-up comedian, actress, writer, producer, television host

values.authorQuote: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: Don't ever criticize yourself. Don't go around all day long thinking, 'I'm unattractive, I'm slow, I'm not as smart as my brother.' God wasn't having a bad day when he made you... If you don't love yourself in the right way, you can't love your neighbour. You can't be as good as you are supposed to be.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: It's easy to get negative because you get beat down. You go through a few disappointments and it's easy to stay in that negative frame of mind. Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is a whole cliche, but your attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: I believe that God has put gifts and talents and ability on the inside of every one of us. When you develop that and you believe in yourself and you believe that you're a person of influence and a person of purpose, I believe you can rise up out of any situation.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: I want to challenge you today to get out of your comfort zone. You have so much incredible potential on the inside. God has put gifts and talents in you that you probably don't know anything about.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you'll get to where God wants you to be.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: You can live your life angry, bitter, mad at somebody or even guilty, not letting go of your own mistakes, but you won't receive the good things God has in store.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: Bottom line: God will not allow any person to keep you from your destiny. They may be bigger, stronger, or more powerful, but God knows how to shift things around and get you to where you're supposed to be.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: God made you a masterpiece - be blessed, secure, disciplined and equipped.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: If you want to reap financial blessings, you have to sow financially.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: I think faith is incredibly important because you will become overwhelmed with what's happening and you will have waves of grief, but when you turn to your faith, I believe God will give you waves of grace to get through it.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: See, when you drive home today, you've got a big windshield on the front of your car. And you've got a little bitty rearview mirror. And the reason the windshield is so large and the rearview mirror is so small is because what's happened in your past is not near as important as what's in your future.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: You have to come to your closed doors before you get to your open doors... What if you knew you had to go through 32 closed doors before you got to your open door? Well, then you'd come to closed door number eight and you'd think, 'Great, I got another one out of the way'... Keep moving forward.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: The main rule to me is to honor God with your life. To life a life of integrity. Not be selfish. You know, help others. But that's really the essence of the Christian faith.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: If you don't set the tone for the day, the devil will set it for you.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: I'm not for gay marriage, but I'm not for discriminating against people.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: It doesn't matter who likes you or doesn't like you, all that matters is that God likes you. He accepts you, he approves of you.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: Sometimes God will deliver you from the fire, and other times God will make you fireproof.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: When the negative thoughts come - and they will; they come to all of us - it's not enough to just not dwell on it... You've got to replace it with a positive thought.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: You know, there is always times where you feel discouraged and things coming against you, but I don't know if I ever wanted to throw in the towel.
values.author: Joel Osteen

values.authorQuote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.

values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: There are only two lasting bequests we can hope to give our children. One of these is roots, the other, wings.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: He is happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: A man's manners are a mirror in which he shows his portrait.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Being brilliant is no great feat if you respect nothing.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Personality is everything in art and poetry.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Divide and rule, the politician cries; unite and lead, is watchword of the wise.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: I call architecture frozen music.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: One must ask children and birds how cherries and strawberries taste.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: On all the peaks lies peace.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: It is after all the greatest art to limit and isolate oneself.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: This is the highest wisdom that I own; freedom and life are earned by those alone who conquer them each day anew.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: There is a courtesy of the heart; it is allied to love. From its springs the purest courtesy in the outward behavior.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Character, in great and little things, means carrying through what you feel able to do.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Beauty is everywhere a welcome guest.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: Every day we should hear at least one little song, read one good poem, see one exquisite picture, and, if possible, speak a few sensible words.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: A really great talent finds its happiness in execution.
values.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
values.authorOccupation: Poet, novelist, playwright, natural philosopher, diplomat, civil servant
values.authorBirthplace: Frankfurt, Free Imperial City of Frankfurt, Holy Roman Empire

values.authorQuote: I must study politics and war that my sons may have liberty to study mathematics and philosophy.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Remember, democracy never lasts long. It soon wastes, exhausts, and murders itself. There never was a democracy yet that did not commit suicide.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Old minds are like old horses; you must exercise them if you wish to keep them in working order.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Because power corrupts, society's demands for moral authority and character increase as the importance of the position increases.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: The happiness of society is the end of government.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Facts are stubborn things; and whatever may be our wishes, our inclinations, or the dictates of our passions, they cannot alter the state of facts and evidence.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: When people talk of the freedom of writing, speaking or thinking I cannot choose but laugh. No such thing ever existed. No such thing now exists; but I hope it will exist. But it must be hundreds of years after you and I shall write and speak no more.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Power always thinks it has a great soul and vast views beyond the comprehension of the weak.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: I have accepted a seat in the House of Representatives, and thereby have consented to my own ruin, to your ruin, and to the ruin of our children. I give you this warning that you may prepare your mind for your fate.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Our Constitution was made only for a moral and religious people. It is wholly inadequate to the government of any other.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: While all other sciences have advanced, that of government is at a standstill - little better understood, little better practiced now than three or four thousand years ago.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: My country has contrived for me the most insignificant office that ever the invention of man contrived or his imagination conceived.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Abuse of words has been the great instrument of sophistry and chicanery, of party, faction, and division of society.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Democracy... while it lasts is more bloody than either aristocracy or monarchy. Remember, democracy never lasts long. It soon wastes, exhausts, and murders itself. There is never a democracy that did not commit suicide.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: There is danger from all men. The only maxim of a free government ought to be to trust no man living with power to endanger the public liberty.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Power always thinks... that it is doing God's service when it is violating all his laws.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Great is the guilt of an unnecessary war.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Fear is the foundation of most governments.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Let us tenderly and kindly cherish, therefore, the means of knowledge. Let us dare to read, think, speak, and write.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Posterity! You will never know how much it cost the present generation to preserve your freedom! I hope you will make a good use of it.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: A government of laws, and not of men.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: Here is everything which can lay hold of the eye, ear and imagination - everything which can charm and bewitch the simple and ignorant. I wonder how Luther ever broke the spell.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: The Declaration of Independence I always considered as a theatrical show. Jefferson ran away with all the stage effect of that... and all the glory of it.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: The right of a nation to kill a tyrant in case of necessity can no more be doubted than to hang a robber, or kill a flea.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: I must not write a word to you about politics, because you are a woman.
values.author: John Adams
values.authorBirthplace: Braintree, Province of Massachusetts Bay, British America

values.authorQuote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: There are two kinds of pride, both good and bad. 'Good pride' represents our dignity and self-respect. 'Bad pride' is the deadly sin of superiority that reeks of conceit and arrogance.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Teamwork makes the dream work, but a vision becomes a nightmare when the leader has a big dream and a bad team.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Your attitude towards failure determines your altitude after failure.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: The difference between average people and achieving people is their perception of and response to failure.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Most people want to avoid pain, and discipline is usually painful.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Time management is an oxymoron. Time is beyond our control, and the clock keeps ticking regardless of how we lead our lives. Priority management is the answer to maximizing the time we have.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Failed plans should not be interpreted as a failed vision. Visions don't change, they are only refined. Plans rarely stay the same, and are scrapped or adjusted as needed. Be stubborn about the vision, but flexible with your plan.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: People who use time wisely spend it on activities that advance their overall purpose in life.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: As a leader, the first person I need to lead is me. The first person that I should try to change is me.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: If you are a leader, you should never forget that everyone needs encouragement. And everyone who receives it - young or old, successful or less-than-successful, unknown or famous - is changed by it.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: A minute of thought is greater than an hour of talk.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Everyone has the potential to become an encourager. You don't have to be rich. You don't have to be a genius. You don't have to have it all together. All you have to do is care about people and initiate.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Leadership is influence.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Without failure there is no achievement.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Good leaders must communicate vision clearly, creatively, and continually. However, the vision doesn't come alive until the leader models it.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: In the end, people are persuaded not by what we say, but by what they understand.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Growth is the great separator between those who succeed and those who do not. When I see a person beginning to separate themselves from the pack, it's almost always due to personal growth.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: Every person has a longing to be significant; to make a contribution; to be a part of something noble and purposeful.
values.author: John C. Maxwell

values.authorQuote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
values.author: John D. Rockefeller
values.authorOccupation: Oil industry business magnate and philanthropist

values.authorQuote: I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.
values.author: John D. Rockefeller
values.authorOccupation: Oil industry business magnate and philanthropist

values.authorQuote: Good management consists in showing average people how to do the work of superior people.
values.author: John D. Rockefeller
values.authorOccupation: Oil industry business magnate and philanthropist

values.authorQuote: If your only goal is to become rich, you will never achieve it.
values.author: John D. Rockefeller
values.authorOccupation: Oil industry business magnate and philanthropist

values.authorQuote: We can never learn too much of His will towards us, too much of His messages and His advice. The Bible is His word and its study gives at once the foundation for our faith and an inspiration to battle onward in the fight against the tempter.
values.author: John D. Rockefeller
values.authorOccupation: Oil industry business magnate and philanthropist

values.authorQuote: I believe that every right implies a responsibility; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty.
values.author: John D. Rockefeller
values.authorOccupation: Oil industry business magnate and philanthropist

values.authorQuote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: Storms of every sort, torrents, earthquakes, cataclysms, 'convulsions of nature,' etc., however mysterious and lawless at first sight they may seem, are only harmonious notes in the song of creation, varied expressions of God's love.
values.author: John Muir
values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: The world, we are told, was made especially for man - a presumption not supported by all the facts. A numerous class of men are painfully astonished whenever they find anything, living or dead, in all God's universe, which they cannot eat or render in some way what they call useful to themselves.
values.author: John Muir
values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world.

values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: The gross heathenism of civilization has generally destroyed nature, and poetry, and all that is spiritual.

values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: There is that in the glance of a flower which may at times control the greatest of creation's braggart lords.
values.author: John Muir
values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: Trees go wandering forth in all directions with every wind, going and coming like ourselves, traveling with us around the sun two million miles a day, and through space heaven knows how fast and far!
values.author: John Muir
values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: The wild Indian power of escaping observation, even where there is little or no cover to hide in, was probably slowly acquired in hard hunting and fighting lessons while trying to approach game, take enemies by surprise, or get safely away when compelled to retreat.
values.author: John Muir
values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: One may as well dam for water tanks the people's cathedrals and churches, for no holier temple has ever been consecrated by the heart of man.
values.author: John Muir
values.authorOccupation: Engineer, naturalist, philosopher, writer, botanist, geologist, environmentalist

values.authorQuote: For you I know I'd even try to turn the tide.

values.authorQuote: You've got to know your limitations. I don't know what your limitations are. I found out what mine were when I was twelve. I found out that there weren't too many limitations, if I did it my way.

values.authorQuote: I was wearing black clothes almost from the beginning. I feel comfortable in black. I felt like black looked good onstage, that it was attractive, so I started wearing it all the time.

values.authorQuote: I read novels but I also read the Bible. And study it, you know? And the more I learn, the more excited I get.

values.authorQuote: I'm very shy really. I spend a lot of time in my room alone reading or writing or watching television.

values.authorQuote: I am not a Christian artist, I am an artist who is a Christian.

values.authorQuote: How well I have learned that there is no fence to sit on between heaven and hell. There is a deep, wide gulf, a chasm, and in that chasm is no place for any man.

values.authorQuote: People call me wild. Not really though, I'm not. I guess I've never been normal, not what you call Establishment. I'm country.

values.authorQuote: The things that have always been important: to be a good man, to try to live my life the way God would have me, to turn it over to Him that His will might be worked in my life, to do my work without looking back, to give it all I've got, and to take pride in my work as an honest performer.

values.authorQuote: Of emotions, of love, of breakup, of love and hate and death and dying, mama, apple pie, and the whole thing. It covers a lot of territory, country music does.
values.author: Johnny Cash

values.authorQuote: That was the big thing when I was growing up, singing on the radio. The extent of my dream was to sing on the radio station in Memphis. Even when I got out of the Air Force in 1954, I came right back to Memphis and started knocking on doors at the radio station.
values.author: Johnny Cash

values.authorQuote: God gives us life and takes us away as He sees fit.
values.author: Johnny Cash

values.authorQuote: When I record somebody else's song, I have to make it my own or it doesn't feel right. I'll say to myself, I wrote this and he doesn't know it!

values.authorQuote: When my wife died, I booked myself into the studio just to work, to occupy myself.
values.author: Johnny Cash

values.authorQuote: I start a lot more songs than I finish, because I realize when I get into them, they're no good. I don't throw them away, I just put them away, store them, get them out of sight.

values.authorQuote: It's like a novelist writing far out things. If it makes a point and makes sense, then people like to read that. But if it's off in left field and goes over the edge, you lose it. The same with musical talent, I think.

Everything I've done has felt very natural, and it's happened because it's happened.
values.author: Johnny Depp

values.authorQuote: You grow up a bit damaged or broken then you have some success but you don't know how to feel good about the work you're doing or the life you're leading.
